replies.body: If your pc can't run League of Legends then you really have to update your PC. Or it might just be your router/wifi
The servers are so horrible right now I forsee a lot of issues with people getting that. Seriously Riot, you guys make too much money to have servers this consistently bad.

Modi gave a solid piece from our support article, and getting a leaverbuster out of your control does suck.  It also sucks for those who are down a player, though.  The [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) would only apply this queue only if you have a history of leaves as well, not just one game.  Your best bet is to continue play consistently without anymore leaves to clear this up.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ#h3q3

> IT'S NOT MY FAULT. MY INTERNET/YOUR SERVERS DISCONNECTED ME. I HAD A REAL-LIFE EMERGENCY. I HAD TO GET OFF THE COMPUTER. THE GAME CRASHED. UNBAN ME!
> 
> We understand that players may be forced to leave from time to time so the system has been designed to keep these situations in mind. After leaving a few games, you will be placed into a low priority queue; as long as you can complete 5 matchmade games without leaving, you will be returned to the normal queue. However, if you continue to leave games, you will remain in the low priority queue.
